name: Farm in another world
description:
Discord


To complete your missing story, you can be Agriculture, Fishing, Mining, Production, Fighting, Cookery and much more!


Examine Town, Underwater City, Lava Mine, Cloud City and much more areas!


You can befriend or fall in love with the townspeople!


Thanks to the upgradable structures, you can grow your farm more and add richness to your wealth!


You can fight evil monsters and add strength to your strength with what you get from these monsters and make the town a safe place!
